Title: Make Better Decisions With These Key Principles with Dave Ramsey
Description:
Tune in for exclusive access to an incredible talk from last year's EntreLeadership Master Series event. You'll hear from our host George Kamel, and then you'll learn about decision-making from Dave Ramsey, the founder and CEO of Ramsey Solutions. Dave unpacks how to be sure you’re making the best decisions for your business and shares the key principles he uses to make decisions—so you can use them too.


You’ll learn:

•      Why you can’t afford to be an indecisive leader

•      A simple but effective tip to finally stop procrastinating

•      How to stop letting other people make decisions for you

•      The quickest way to eliminate fear in decision-making
